blogPost.excerpt: Freelanium is a platform for freelancers to charge their clients quickly, safely and without commissions, in addition to being able to have all their activity organized on the same platform
blogPost.body: Freelanium is a platform for freelancers to charge their clients quickly, safely and without commissions, in addition to being able to have all their activity organized on the same platform
blogPost.title: Freelanium - All in one easy agreements platform for freelancers
blogPost.author: Alex Hernandez

localize.description: Freelanium是一个为自由职业者提供的平台，除了能够在同一个平台上组织他们的所有活动外，还可以快速、安全、无佣金地向客户收费。
localize.tagline: 为自由职业者提供一个简单的协议平台。

localize.description: Freelanium是一個爲自由職業者提供的平臺，除了能夠在同一個平臺上組織他們的所有活動外，還可以快速、安全、無佣金地向客戶收費。
localize.tagline: 爲自由職業者提供一個簡單的協議平臺。

previous.excerpt: Find all the curated news and tools for Instagram. Featuring Anonymous Story Viewers, Stock Photos, Stock Videos and Marketing Tools as well as Story Designers & Post Editors.
previous.title: IG Tools - Latest Instagram marketing news and tools

localize.description: 查找Instagram的所有策划新闻和工具。提供匿名故事浏览者、图片库、视频库和营销工具，以及故事设计师和文章编辑。
localize.tagline: 最新的Instagram营销新闻和工具

localize.description: 查找Instagram的所有策劃新聞和工具。提供匿名故事瀏覽者、圖片庫、視頻庫和營銷工具，以及故事設計師和文章編輯。
localize.tagline: 最新的Instagram營銷新聞和工具

next.excerpt: Analyze reviews with enriched company profiles from 85+ review sites in one place.
next.title: Datashake - Turning scraped data into intelligent data

localize.description: 在一个地方分析评论与丰富的公司简介，从85 +评论网站。
localize.tagline: 把搜刮的数据变成智能数据

localize.description: 在一個地方分析評論與豐富的公司簡介，從85 +評論網站。
localize.tagline: 把搜刮的數據變成智能數據
